name: Corn Junior's Journey
description:
The citizens of Corn Land are sick and tired of King Cob and his tyrannical rule! He's been stealing precious candy corn and hoarding it all for himself. Thankfully, sweet little Corn Junior has volunteered to stand up for justice once and for all. Help Corn Junior navigate through Kernel Castle to defeat the evil King Cob and restore peace to Corn Land!

    Don't be alarmed if you encounter King Cob's fierce henchmen while traversing Kernel Castle's corridors. Cornelius Corndog, Peggy Popcorn, and Terrence Corn Tortilla will do everything in their power to make sure Corn Junior doesn't reach the King's chambers. Use Corn Junior's handy bubble gun to defeat these wicked foes. Here's what you need to know in order to successfully journey through the Castle's three rooms:

     W, A, S, D - Move

     Space - Shoot bubbles

Collect all the candy corn to advance to the next level.

Corn Land is depending on you. Good luck!
